column4: Installed grub on windows 7 partition inadvertently, grub will load linux but when I try to load windows 7, it says "error fylesystem not found". While in linux I can open my windows partition, so the files are still intact. I also tried the windows 7 install disk startup repair multiple times, no dice. Anyone have any idea?
does booting into ubuntu and running "sudo update-grub2" find/correct your windows install?
ummmm, sorry can't help then.  good luck.
